title: Spaceships,  Concept Design pipeline for Sci-fi.

media:group.media:title: Spaceships,  Concept Design pipeline for Sci-fi.
media:group.media:description:
Presentation on how to design futuristic props and vehicle.
Balancing design and technique to improve life quality for concept artists. From grease pencil to geometry nodes and procedural materials, i'll do an overview on How the design processcan be easier in order to define ideas faster and help with most tedious parts of the 3d design process.

"Spaceships,  Concept Design pipeline for Sci-fi." by Alberto Petronio
Blender Conference 2022
2022-10-29 12:30 at the studio.
